title: Do you think this is good?
content:
Can you critique this type, specifically the F. I did some modifications to it to give it some  
personality, and am wondering if it looks alright, thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Foto.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824170329/http:/typophile.com/files/Foto.jpg) | 24.49 KB |
author: bweiland

comments.content: Looks pretty cool to me. Hard to say if it is a good design solution since I don't know its purpose or context. None the less looks interesting and well done. Hope this helps.

The kerning feels a little to tight to me. The space between the "t" and "o" are pretty much touching which to me seems to much.

p@
